I just thought it was funny that in TX during the legislative session, it was considered to have foster children removed from gay families. The measure would have passed, except when they did the math, it turned out that TX couldn't afford to take foster kids away from gay families because the state could not afford it.
 
 Now that's what I call natural justice!
